title: Add URL-based test plan generator with Auto + Manual workflow

requirements.text: Add a new "Web App Testing" generator flow where a user can paste a website URL, click "Generate", and receive (a) generated test cases, (b) a generated bug list, and (c) generated corner/edge cases for that target website.

quotes: copy the website link and paste into it and i need test case, bug list ,corner cases all functionalities
i need to to test my project in this new website .. how will i paste the link
"Auto + Manual" (paste link → get results + you can add your own)

acceptanceCriteria: Frontend provides a URL input field and a primary "Generate" action.
URL is validated client-side (must be http/https and a valid hostname); invalid input blocks generation with a clear error message.
Submitting a valid URL results in visible generated outputs for: test cases, bug list, and corner cases.
Generation works without using any external AI/LLM services or third-party APIs.

requirements.text: Implement backend data models and persistence for "target websites" and their generated artifacts so each user can generate and revisit results for multiple URLs over time.

quotes: copy the website link and paste into it and i need test case, bug list ,corner cases all functionalities

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes methods to create/list/get target website entries (at minimum: id, url, createdAt, updatedAt).
Backend stores generated test cases, generated bug suggestions, and generated corner cases associated to a target website id.
All stored data is scoped to the calling principal (one user cannot read/modify another user’s targets and artifacts).
After a page refresh, previously generated targets and artifacts can be reloaded from the backend.

requirements.text: Implement deterministic, template-based generation logic that produces a reasonable baseline set of test cases, bug suggestions, and corner cases from a URL, without attempting to crawl or fetch the target website content.

quotes: copy the website link and paste into it and i need test case, bug list ,corner cases all functionalities
"Auto + Manual" (paste link → get results + you can add your own)

acceptanceCriteria: Backend generation creates at least: 20+ test cases, 10+ bug suggestions, and 10+ corner cases for a new URL.
Generated items include clear English titles and step-by-step content (where applicable), not just single-line bullets.

Generated items include a mix of functional areas commonly applicable to web apps (e.g., navigation, forms, auth patterns, error states, accessibility, responsiveness, performance/smoke checks) while remaining generic (no claims about site-specific features).
Generation output is stable for the same URL (same input URL yields the same output unless a version/seed is explicitly changed).

requirements.text: Add an "Auto + Manual" workflow: after generation, allow users to review and manually add/edit/delete test cases and bugs within the app UI, starting from the generated baseline for a given target website.

quotes: "Auto + Manual" (paste link → get results + you can add your own)

acceptanceCriteria: From a generated results view, the user can: edit a generated test case, add a new test case, and delete a test case; changes persist to the backend.
From a generated results view, the user can: edit a generated bug suggestion, add a new bug, and delete a bug; changes persist to the backend.
Manual edits do not get overwritten when the user revisits the same target website’s results.
UI clearly distinguishes generated items vs user-edited/user-created items (e.g., label or badge).

requirements.text: Integrate the generator into the existing navigation and routing so users can easily access it, and connect existing Test Cases / Bugs areas to the selected target website context.

quotes: i need to to test my project in this new website .. how will i paste the link

acceptanceCriteria: A new navigation entry exists (e.g., "Web App Testing" or "Generator") that routes to the generator page.
Generator page includes a way to see/select previously created target websites (history list) and open their generated results.
When a target website is selected, the UI shows test cases, bug list, and corner cases for that target website.
User-facing text across the generator pages is in English.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no multi-canister or microservices architecture).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing shadcn components instead).

Do not modify frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, and frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not use external databases or third-party AI/LLM APIs; generation must be implemented within the app (deterministic/template-based).
nonGoals: Crawling, scraping, or fetching the target website’s HTML to infer real features.
Automated dynamic testing of the pasted URL (no browser automation, no Playwright/Selenium integration).
Real-time collaboration, chat, or WebSocket-driven updates.
Third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is allowed).
